name: Bat of Dead
description:
In this game you take on the role of a bat in a world full of madness, crazy dangers, strange creatures and unrealistic charismatic ducks for the bathroom !!!
You can run with a bat. Walk with a bat.
The strangest thing you've seen in your life.
Looking for the weirdest games?
You have come to the right place !!!
In this game you will find:
1) Strange levels full of madness!
2)Incredibly cool music.
3) Fun gameplay ... Do you have a mouse?
4) The bat will come to visit you.
5) Hardcore ... not so much ... but enough ...
6) 4 endings of varying difficulty.
7) Play it already.

Hey, not so often games appear where almost every level is unique, every moment is created with love, soul and from the heart.
Five years of creation were not in vain.
Five long years, several completely different games, and here I am ready to present you the Bat of Dead.
Absolutely weird conceptual experience.
